1.content: Who do you what as the key main Character of the story?
1.title: Character

13.content:

YUSEI WITH STARDUST DRAGON

13.title: Yusei

131.content:
The Old Highways of Satellite are never silent. There’s always a Turbo Duel, a Race or a Time Attack going on or just an adrenaline junkie looking for some cheap thrills shooting through the worn-down elevated roads of the run-down city. And today was no different. But among the various Duel Runners speeding along and smashing into the roads, there were two that stood out. Barreling down the straightaways of the Old Highways, were a red arrow-like Duel Runner, and a while Uniwheel Duel Runner. These were Duel Runners of Yusei Fudo and Jack Atlus, the Yusei Go And Wheel of Fortune, respectively. A simple Race was what was taking place between them.

“Better watch out, Yusei. I, Jack Atlus, The Master of Faster and his Wheel of Fortune, won’t settle for second place. I’m gonna pass you.” Jack declared boldly.

Yusei chuckled. “Pass me? Not with how you handled those corners, Jack. I left you in the dust back there!”

“And we seem to be neck and neck now, Yusei.”

“Just wait, Jack. With the route we’re racing, you’ll soon be stuck in second.”

“Only if I slow down, and I only slow down, if I break down.”

Yusei smirked and focused on the road. “Better think fast, or you’ll break your body!” With that, he swung right then straightened out, no longer right beside Jack, and then hit the brakes on the Yusei Go, slowing down to watch Jack speed ahead, swerve to dodge a different Race going the other way, and then scrape the Wheel of Fourtune along the concrete barrier. He hoped that Jack wasn’t also scraping his knee along the concrete as well, that would really, really, hurt. He sped up to dash past Jack, passing him and the Racers, and soon spotted where he wanted to go: a turn off to another highway. “There we go.” He leaned right and turned, and shot down the turn off, onto the other highway.
131.title: Yuesi!

132.content:
The Old Highways of Satellite are never silent. There’s always a Turbo Duel, a Race or a Time Attack going on or just an adrenaline junkie looking for some cheap thrills shooting through the worn-down elevated roads of the run-down city. And today was no different. But among the various Duel Runners speeding along and smashing into the roads, there were two that stood out. Barreling down the straightaways of the Old Highways, were a red arrow-like Duel Runner, and a while Uniwheel Duel Runner. These were Duel Runners of Yusei Fudo and Jack Atlus, the Yusei Go And Wheel of Fortune, respectively. A simple Race was what was taking place between them.
“Better watch out, Yusei. I, Jack Atlus, The Master of Faster and his Wheel of Fortune, won’t settle for second place. I’m gonna pass you.” Jack declared boldly.
Yusei chuckled. “Pass me? Not with how you handled those corners, Jack. I left you in the dust back there!”
“And we seem to be neck and neck now, Yusei.”
“Just wait, Jack. With the route we’re racing, you’ll soon be stuck in second.” “Only if I slow down, and I only slow down, if I break down.”
Yusei smirked and focused on the road. “Better think fast, or you’ll break your body!” With that, Yusei swung right then straightened out, no longer right beside Jack, and then hit the brakes on the Yusei Go, slowing down to watch Jack speed ahead, swerve to
Confused, Jack turned his eyes to the road, and then yelled and swerved to dodge a different Race occurring on the same stretch of road. He rammed the side of the Wheel of Fortune into the highway barrier in his haste to dodge, and screamed (half in horror, half in rage)as he hear the sound of metal scrape against concrete. Turning to swerve back into the middle of the road very quickly, he cut the other Duel Wheels off, causing them to brake suddenly. Up ahead, he saw Yusei turn-off onto another highway, and he scowled harder then he had before.
“Nobody, not even my friends, makes me damage my Duel Runner...And gets away with it! YUSEI!!!!!! I’M COMING FOR YOU!” he screamed, now as mad as when Crow stole his Cup Ramen. He turned the Wheel of Fortune towards the same turn-off Yusei had used and gunned the throttle of the Wheel of Fortune, hot on Yusei’s trail.
132.title: All Hail The King!

choices: Go off and meet another group
14.content:
Yuma, Astral, Tori, Bronk, Shark, Kari, and Cathy rubbed their eyes as s huge appeared around them. After it went away, they all noticed that they were in a new location from where they last were. Yuma looked around, trying to figure out where they were. "Hey, where the heck are we?" Yuma asked Kari. Kari just sighed and hit him on the back of the head. "How am I suppose to know that?" she told him.

Yuma sat on the ground, crisscrossed, holding his head in pain. Astral floated over to him and said, "Why did she hit you?" Yuma just looked up at him with a blank face. "How am I suppose to know, onee-chan is just irritable like that," Yuma said only to start sweating when he heard knuckles cracking and felt tons of killer intent. Yuma jumped up and ran away with Kari following him with deadly aura surrounding her.

"Get back here!" she yelled, but he ignored her and kept running. Unfortunately he tripped and hit the ground. He groaned in pain as he sat up and then felt a chill go down his back as he felt his sister put her hand on his shoulder. Yuma slowly looked up at her and smiled sacredly. Before she could hit him, a poof of smoke caught them offguard, making Kari fall over Yuma and land in front of him. Yuma looked down at her and blushed when he saw that she was wearing a skirt and that he could see her panties thanks to how she fell. Kari realized this too because she quickly rolled off him and stood up.

They both looked up and saw a weird shadow figure. "Please return to your group," it said before disappearing again. Yuma and Kari looked at each other and shrugged before walking back to their friends. After getting back, they noticed that there was now more people, but they were separated by see through barriers. Astral floated next to Yuma. "I tried to get through those barriers, but even I can't get through them," he told Yuma.

Yuma nodded his head and just kept walking with Kari. After reaching their group, a loud explosion went off, catching everyone's attention. They all looked up and saw a man, wearing a long black cape that was flowing in the wind, a helmet that showed just some of his black hair, half a mask that just showed his left eye and part of his mouth, red fingerless gloves, long sleeved black shirt with a weird symbol on it, black pants, and black boots. He also had what seemed to be a weird duel disk that kind of looked like a fusion of all the duel disks from all 4 YGO series.

"Hello duelists! My name is not important right now, but I will tell you that I have brought you all here to compete in the greatest dueling competition ever held. To get back to your homes, you will have to win this contest," he said. He was cut off when someone with a Brooklyn accent yelled, "What happens to those who lose?!"

The guy looked at him and said, "They will find out when the time comes. Now the contest will start in exactly 2 hours. I will let you all talk with the other competitors if you want. See you soon." The guy disappeared and the barriers separating everybody went away.

Yuma...
14.title: Yuma

141.content:
"Sweet! Another dueling tournament!" Yuma yelled catching everyone in the room's attention. He looked around and smiled awkwardly, only to yell in pain after Kari hit him in the head. "Ow...onee-chan," he moaned. She glared down at him and he looked back in fright. She sighed and then said, "Yuma, you know that I despise you're dueling, but it seems I'm going to have to rely on it to get back home."
"Wait one-chan...you actually want me to duel?" he asked her in shock. She just sighed and nodded, only to look down in shock when he hugged her. She just sighed and hugged back before Yuma was sent flying away. Kari looked up in shock and turned her head to see a guy with spikey silver hair and veins bulging. He held up a rod and said, "This disgusts me. All of this lovey dovey crap. Listen to me now. If I run into any of you, I will destroy you. I may have lost the Egyptian God Card when I arrived, but I still won't lose."
Yuma jumped up and tried to punch him, but he dodged it and then brought up his rod. Astral, who was watching, felt a great power in it. "Yuma move!" Yuma heard, only to not hear and get sent flying. The guy was about to do it again when someone ran inbetween them.
"Marik, I don't know why that guy brought you from the past, but we defeated you once and we will again. It also helps that you lost the Winged Dragon of Ra. Stay away from these people, you got it," the short guy said. Newly named, Marik just 'hnned' as he walked away. The guy who got him to leave turned around to Yuma who was lying there looking at him. Kari ran past the guy over to Yuma and checked him for injuries. "Thank goodness," she said as she hugged him.
Yuma just smiled and then looked at the guy who got Marik to leave and instantly noticed him from when he was looking up historical documents on great duelists and it was the past 'King of Games' Yugi Muto. "Y-Yugi Muto?" Yuma stuttered. Yugi just smiled as he helped Yuma up after Kari stopped hugging Yuma. "Watch out for that guy okay. His name is Marik Ishtar and he is able to send people's souls to the Shadow Realm, a place where people can die or be tortured for eternity. My friends and I defeated him once, but the guy who brought us here must have brought him back from the past. Thankfully he doesn't have The Winged Dragon of Ra God card. Sadly since he doesn't that means the guy who brought us here probably does," Yugi explained to him before walking over to a group of people that Yuma probably thought were his friends.
"Yuma. Please be careful. If that guy is as dangerous as Yugi says, we are in trouble and I don't want to lose you like how mom and dad are gone," Kari told him. Yuma smiled as he stuck out his pinky,"Onee-chan I pinky promise that I won't let that guy or anybody else get rid of me." Kari smiled back and pinky promised with him. So she may be 20 years old. You're never to old to pinky promise anyone.
Yuma and Kari saw the guy who abducted everyone come back and announced...
141.title: Talked to Kari (Eikenrocks2 path)

1411.content:
"Now that everyone is all settled in their little groups, I shall explain the rules again," the guy said. Yuma just glared up at him as Astral floated next to him. Yuma, Kari, and the rest of his friends that came listened to the guy speak again. "Also! I added a new rule to this tournament. You may choose one partner if you desire. The remaining duelist or duelists will duel me for the right to return back to their time," he explained before disappearing again.
Yuma looked at Astral and smiled. Since Astral wasn't really a human, he didn't count as a partner and he could travel around and help Yuma. He looked at his friends and realized that some of them were in trouble since some doesn't know how to duel. Well Kotori does, but what about...he looked at his sister. He walked over to her. "Onee-chan will you like to be my partner?" he asked her. Akari looked at him in shock before saying, "Yuma what do you mean. I don't know how to duel. I would be a nuisance to you." Yuma just shrugged his shoulders and said, "You are the only one of the people who arrived here with me who doesn't know how to duel and with people like that Marik guy walking around, I don't want you to be walking around by yourself okay."
Akari looked at him for a second before smiling and hugging. She looked over and saw duel disks, duel gazers for some, and duel monster cards packs for the people who came and don't duel. After getting a duel gazer, her own styled duel disks, and enough duel packs to make her own deck, she walked back over to Yuma and told him she was ready to start. Yuma looked up at her and smiled.
He then headed over to his friends. "Guys I have teamed up with onee-chan since she is the only one of us who doesn't know how to duel so I'm going to protect her. I'll meet you guys later I guess. Please don't lose and if you meet a guy named Marik, try not to duel him okay," Yuma warned them before walking back over to Akari. They then headed to their designated spots that those same shadow creatures from earlier showed them to. Suddenly everyone in the room heard the mastermind's voice say, "On your marks, get set, go!" Everyone then vanished from where they were standing.
1411.title: And the Tournament Begins!

choices: Talk with the starfish haired boy in a school uniform (DM)
Talk with the brown haired red jacketed boy (GX)
Talk with the spikey haired young man near a bike(5Ds)
144.content:
....decide to talk to Astral, mainly to figure out what exactly was going on. This was all so sudden, and Yuma’s brain was still trying to process it. While it was a Duel Championship, they way it was all set up and the dude who was running it.....it confused him.
As his friends started to spread out, Yuma decided to ask his partner.

“Astral, do you have any idea of what exactly is happening here?” he inquired, hoping to get something from his partner that could make sense to him. Unfortunately for him....”I.....have no clue.” Astral said, stumped. This was a shock. “Aside from the fact this is a Dueling Competition with the stakes being a way back home, I have no idea who that man could be, or what technology he’s using, or why he has called us here, or if he has any ulterior motives....I am as clueless as your are normally.”
“Hey! Thanks a lot...” Yuma angrily muttered at the burn Astral had given him. “But if you don’t know then I guess we’ll have to figure it out as we go along.” he said, renewing his vigour. “For the sake of everyone, I’ll win this thing and get us back home!” he said with fire in his eyes and a red hot fiery spirit!

“What’s more, I have no clue how this particular Duel Competition works. It was never mentioned by the black figure...” Astral muttered.

*beat*

“HHHHUUUHHHH?! YOU MEAN WE DON’T EVEN KNOW THE RULES?!” Yuma’s shock was heard through the whole area of Duelists.(An expatriated ‘you only just figured that out?’ came from one of his friends.) What’s more, at this, a poof of smoke occurred and the shadowy figure that had told Yuma and Kairi to go back to their group appeared again. “Do you require assistance?” it asked, in a echoey voice. “Yes, please. We would like clarification on the rules of this championship.” Astral replied. The shadowy figure responded with a simple “Certainly.” and then began to explain the rules.
“Although in two hours time the rules will be explained to you, you requested that you have the rules explained to you now. The Cross Championships Rules are simple yet strange: Master Rule 4, No Banned Cards, 60 Cards Maximium Deck Size, 17 Card Maximum Extra Deck Size. You will all be released into a cityscape, and your goal is to rack up 10 wins and then make it to the Arena in the middle of the cityscape. The first 8 Duelists there will be the Top 8, and will fight each other in the Egao Torinement, where the winner will receive the prize of sending everyone from his dimension home. However, if you arrive at the arena without 10 wins, you will not get the spot in the top 8. Losing a Duel will subtract a win, and if you lose 5 times in a row or cheat, you will be eliminated. Also, there are cards scattered about the cityscape that you can add to your deck to improve it. All understood?”

“Ummm.....what’s Master Rule 4?” Yuma asked, confused. Astral chimed in.”I’ve never heard of that before, either.....did the duel format get updated on us?” The shadowy figure nodded, and a shadowy duel mat with two extra zones in the middle of the board appeared. “Master Rule 4. This format of Dueling include the Extra Monster Zones, for which Special Summoned Monsters from the Extra Deck must go when Special Summoned. They cannot be placed in Normal Monster Zones.”
It took a moment to process it, but when Yuma did....”YOU’RE KIDDING ME! THAT’S-?!”...he flipped out.
“Interesting. Very interesting! The restriction of Special Summoned Extra Deck Monsters to this Extra Monster Zone adds for some more strategy to Dueling.....do you go for a Link to get more Extra Deck Monsters out and risk losing them when the link is destroyed or restrict yourself to one Extra Deck Monster?” Astral, on the other hand, was marvelling at it.
“However, there is a way to get around the restriction. A special type of monster, called a Link Monster, is blue with circuit lines on it and arrows around the artwork. If the arrow is coloured orange and it is pointing to a Normal Monster Zone, you can Special Summon an Extra Deck Monster there. That is why the Extra Deck limit has been raised to 17, to fit two Link Monsters to help you out. Is that all you require assistance with?” the shadowy figure finished with.
“..yeah, I got it. Two spaces to summon Extra Deck Monsters to, and unless a Orange Arrow on a Link Monster is pointing to a Normal Monster Zone, you can’t summon Extra Deck Monsters there.” Yuma summed up. “That is all.” Astral said, which dismissed the shadowy figure, as it vanished in another puff of smoke.

“Well,” Yuma said, pulling his D-Gazer out of his pocket and fixing it to the side of his head, “I’m ready to duel, Astral! Can’t believe I’ve gotta wait out two whole hours, though.....”
“Indeed.” The Astral World inhabit spoke. “Now that we know the rules, and we have time to burn, let’s....as you say, ‘scope out the competition’, shall we?”
There were a lot of people...who to talk to first?
144.title: Astral: Learning the Rules

15.content:
The story starts in a location void of matter, just a lot of nothingness. Then suddenly thousands of people appeared. This people were from differnet places in time and space. There was only one thing that bond them together. They were all duelists.
Several of this duelist where confused as to what happen. Many said things like, Where are we? and Why are they their? Things of that nature. Alright who is responsible for this? Said a young man with blond hair and a Brooklin accent that goes by the name Joey Wheeler.
For once I agree with the dog. Said a man around the same age with brown hair that was known as Seto Kaiba.
So You must be responsible for this. Joey said. Then just then someone passed by.
If you are really behind this then you have some explaining. Said a man with slicked back blond hair wearing a white jacket as he took hold of Seto's jacket.
Hands off me. Do you know know I am? Kaiba asked. I am Seto Kaiba. The new blond then used his free hand and took hold of Seto's face and tryed to pull. What is the meaning of this? What was about?
How is it possible? You are suppose to be dead.
What do you mean dead? Seto said as he got free.
The man then looked around and stared at Joey. And Your Joey Wheeler.
So You heard of me.
Of course. a Friend of the undisputed King of games.
Hey who do you think You are? Joey asked.
Jack Atlas. I am known as the Duel King.
Is that so. Then let's duel.
I don't think this is the place for a duel. They looked to see a little guy with spiked black, blond, and Purple hair.
You're Yugi Muto. Jack said.
I agree with him, Jack. Said a man with spiked black hair with blond hightlites and a yellow mark going down his cheek.
Yusei, your here to? Yugi said.
So the gang is all hear. Said a boy with two shades of brown hair wearing a red jacket.
Jaden. You too.
Yeah. But who is the one reponsible for this?
Just then a pilliar of black light appeared. everyone stepped back. Then the pilliar disappeared and then a man wearing a black cloak stood where the pilliar was.
So you are the one responsible. Yusei said. WHo are you?
Then man reach up and lowered his hood. With that the cloak disappeared and the man was wearing a black suit instead. He had scraggy red hair with black hightlights. He was wearind sunglasses so his eyes could not be seen.
One more time. Yugi said. WHo are you?
THe man then said. The name is Zenaku, and I brought all you here for one reason.
And that reason is? Seto asked.
Why to duel of course. Zenaku said.
15.title: Doesn't matter (randomness)

151.content:
What do you mean to duel? Many of the duelist's asked but the one that Zenaku focused on was Jack.
I will explain this the best way I can. Attention Duelists. at this time you are all in a dimention I created using ceirtain means that some of you will not believe. You are all from different points in time and space. All of you are from points that your disappearence will not cause a big enough impact to change history. Zenaku passed. I gathered the strongest duelists in all time to find out who is the best. Participation is maintory.
Looks like we have no choose. Seto said.
Right. Jack said.
Before I declare the start with there anything that any of you wish to say?
Yeah. The voice was from a boy with spiked black hair with a red hightlight and red eyes.
What is it that wish to say. Yuma Tsukumo.
Yeah bring it on. Yuma said. How did you know my name?
Simple. Everyone for the most part were chosen at random. But there were a few that I hand picked to bring here. You are one of them.
The tornament is three stages. First is the elimitaion round. You duel to earn points. You may duel someone more then once but don't think that you can win only doing that. After all the same opponents will not give you the same points in a duel. Those who win the most points will pass to the next round. I will explain more later on that. In one hour the matches will start. Just then the area change. I thing wildrness is the best setting for the an elimitation round. Take that time to get yourselves ready. With that Zenaku disappeared.
Well I guess if we have to duel then be should duel to win. Jaden said.
Right. Yusei said.
Ah ha. Yugi said. Just then there was a glow in front of him.
At the same moment Yusei and Jack felt a burning sensation on their right arms.
In front of Yugi appeared the Millenium Puzzle. How do I have the Puzzle.
Jack and Yusei looked to see that they had there respective marks. What is going on?
That Zenaku guy said he wants the stongest Duelist. Looks like he thinks you are stronger with same help.
That sounds about right. Said a voice.
Did you hear that?
I heard nothing. Joey said.
Then it must be. Yugi said as he placed the Puzzle around his neck. Just then Yugi grow to about the same height as the others.
The Pharaoh must be back. Joey said.
Pharaoh? I don't see him anywhere?
It is complicated. "Yugi" said. But now lets get ready for the tornament.
They all shook there heads. All but Seto. This my not be the why I wished it but Atleast I will take the title from you Yugi.
And if we duel then I am looking followed to it. Yugi said.
There was a flash that signaled the start of the first stage of the tornament.
151.title: More details.

1511.content:
The elimination round of the tornament is going by swiftly. Duelists have been going through duels, earning points left and right. Moments later and then there was another flash. Just then Zenaku appeared. Okay time is up. Now it is time for the next stage. Zenaku then snapped his fingers and seveal people disappeared. What did you do? Yugi asked.
Don't worry. I just sent those how have not earned enough to advance into storage. They will be find. Zenaku said. Now time for the next round. WIth that the area changed into a cityscape.You each will find you have a circler device with one piece in each. You must get twelve pieces in total To get to the next stage. You may cause to use any rules you wish just have do your best. To the all i wish good luck now begin. With that he disappeared again.
When he left everyone then started off to duel. Some how, Yugi, Jaden, and Yusei managed to met up with each other. So What now? Jaden asked.
I think Zenaku want's a big show. I think the best show would be to save us for last. Yusei said.
So it is agreed that we will wait for the finals to due each other. Yugi said. They all agreed. Just then there was a commotion. What could that be?
Let's check it out. Jaden said as the three of them headed for the commotion.
1511.title: Start of the duels

15111.content:
The three duelists were on root when then saw two people running. The two of them and Jaden bumped into each other. Yugi reconized them right away. Weevile Underwood and Rex Raptor. So you two are here.
Yugi. Rex said.
Of course the king of Games would be here. Weevil said.
Why were you two running? Yusei asked.
No reason. The two said. Plus it has nothing to do with you. Weevil said.
There you are! they all looked to see who just spoke. It was the kid Yuma. Give it back.
What are you taking about? Jaden asked.
This two steal my friend's cloak pieces. Yuma said.
There is no proof. Weevil said.
He may not by I do. They all looked to see a man in a white cloak.
Who are you? Yuma asked.
I am a Overseer. A judge to make sure there is fair play.
Then you can prove that these two stole my friend's pieces. Yuma said.
I am sorry but dispite there methods there is nothing I can do. What done is done. Your friends have already been kicked out of the tornament. But this two can not be left unpunished. Just then lighting struck Rex sending him back.
What was that? Yusei asked.
I just destroyied the pieces taken by them. Now What to do about this two?
Wait. Yuma said. They may have stole but they are duelists and deserve a chance to stay in.
Yuma Tsukumo, there was then a pause. Alright. Weevil Underwood,Yuma Tsukumo. The two of you will duel and if Yuma wins then he gets both yours and Rex Raptor's pieces. If you win then you get Yuma's one piece.
Alright then. Weevil said.
Hey Weevil, what are you doing risking my piece. Rex said.
That is way in addition, if I win Rex will get Yuma's deck.
I can not allow that. Unless Yuma agrees to it.
There was a pause. Yuma then looked to his right. Alright. He said. Alright I will do it.
Good. The Overseer said. Then when you are both ready.
Okay, Let's duel. Yuma said.
15111.title: more details.

151111.content:
Let's get this started. Yuma said. He then took out his Duel Pad.
Hey where is his duel disk? Jaden asked.
Duel disk Set. Yuma said as his duel pad turned into a duel disk. D-gazer on line.
D-gazer? Jaden asked.
THen the overseer spoke. A d-gazer is a type of viewer used to see the Augmented Reality, or AR, that exist in the time period of Yuma.
What is AR, exactly? Yusei asked.
As you may assume there are a lot of technology in his time. So much that the electricial signals allow an virual world to duel in. This realm has been modifyed to allow them to duel in this Enviroment.
Enough talk. Weevil said. Let's duel.
With that both duelist's life points were set to 4000.
Yuma: 4000
Weevil: 4000
I'll go first. Weevil said. I summon Pinch Hopper in attack mode. With that a giant grasshopper appeared. att: 1000 Def: 1200.
Is that all? Yuma asked. Yuma then looked to his right. You think so ha?
The duel has started already and you are breaking up. Weevil said. I activate Eradicating Aerosol. With that Pitch Hopper was destroyed.
You just destroyed your own monster. Yuma asked. But why?
When Pitch Hopper is Destroyed i can summon an insect monster form my hand to the field. I summon Insect Queen. A giant bug appeared on Weevil's field. Att: 2200 Def: 2400.
That is one big bug. Yusei said.
That is my turn.
Okay My move. Yuma then draw. I summon Gogogo Golem in defence mode. Just then a green and blue stone creature with one red eye appeared. Att: 1800 Def: 1500. Now I play two cards face down. Your move Weevil.
Very well. Weevil then draw. I summon a second Pitch Hopper. Now I tribute it so i can attack with insect queen. but first i can special summon another monster. Larva Moth. A small worm apeared. Att: 500 Def:400.
It is only a level two monster. Yuma said. What do you have planned?
More on that later. Now Insect Queen attack. Insect Queen attacked but Gogogo Golem remained. Hey what is the deal. I attacked your golem. It should be destroyed.
Once per turn when Gogogo Golem is attacked in defence mode he is not destroyed. Yuma said.
I set two cards and end my turn. Weevil said.
Okay my move. Yuma said. I summon Achacha Archer in attack mode. A bowsman appeared. when he is summoned I inflict 500 points of damage to my opponent. The archer then pulled an arrow back and then when it lit on fire the archer let it go striking Weevil.
Yuma: 4000
Weevil: 3500
Now Achacha Archer attack Larva moth. It attacked.
I activate my trap card. DNA Surgury. It allows me to change the type of monsters on the field. And I choose Insect.
So what My attack still goes through.
Not with this. Insect Barrier. Insect monsters on your field can't attack.
The attack faded. I end my turn.
My move. Weevil said. First i play the spell card Cell Division. Now i make a copy of larva moth. Next I tribute the true Larva Moth for Cocoon of Evolution. now I tribute my token to attack.
Insect queen attacked.
I activate my trap. Bye Bye Damage. Since you attacked an attack mode monster I can make my monster unable to be destroyed and then deal twice the damage to you.
Yuma: 2600
Weevil: 700
I end my turn.
Okay my move. Yuma said. Man I need to win. What do I do? That's it. I summon Gagaga Magician. A spellcaster with a scar appeared. Att: 1500 Def: 1000.
That monster. It looks like Dark Magician. Yugi said.
But what would that do? Yusei asked.
Now I will overlay with Gagaga Magician and Gogogo Golem. With this two monsters I create the Overlay Network. I XYZ summon Number 39 Utopia. With that a giant white and gold winged warrior appeared. Att: 2500 Def: 2000.
What is a Number monster? Weevil asked. Don't matter. It still can't attack.
I set one card face down and end my turn.
My move. Weevil draw.
I activate my face down Command of the Sword.
What dues that do? You must show me that card. if it is a spell or trap i get one of two effects. Ethier you Discard the revealed card or I Target 1 Spell or Trap Card you control and destroy it.
Lucky you. Weevil showed the card to be Infection.
I am destroying Insect barrier.
What ever. I summon Cockroach knight and tribute it to attack.
I activate the effect of Utopia. I remove one XYZ matiral and negater your attack.
I end.
No I attack Insect Queen but I negate my attack and activate Double up and attack again.
No.
Yuma: 2600
Weevil: 0
Yuma wins.
Just then two more pieces appeared in Yuma's Clock.
I won Yeah. Yuma said.
And now for this two. the overseer said. He then pulled out a shroad and throw it over Rex and Weevil. The two the disappeared and soon did the Overseer.
151111.title: The duel

info.brief_description: What would happen if the main characters from all Yugioh were forced into a Tournament.
info.description:
The main characters of Yugioh, GX, 5D's, and Zexal are brought to another dimention by a mystrious man. The reason? To hold the biggest Dueling Tornament in all of Time and Space. The only way that he will let them go free is if they win the tornament. Follow the activitys of the tornament as either Yugi Muto, Jaden Yuki, Yusei Fudo, or Yuma Tsukumo.

Rules for Additions:

no character bashing.
no OC characters, except the master mind of the tornament and those working as eliminators, or OC personallities.
Keep Duels of people from the same timeline (series) to a minimum. ( That way it decreases the chances of someone just typing a duel scenario that already accured.) In addition, make sure to have Character counter parts duel against each other at least once throughout the tornament. Ex. Yugi = Jaden = Yusei = Yuma.
You can have non-dueling Characters added. Also you can have it that some how they get seperated form their group and meet up with another's group.
The decks of each duelist must be, for the most part, be accurate. You can have it that duelist have cards that would improve there deck. Ex. Joey Wheeler may same how get his hands on an XYZ. But it can not be a key card for another's deck.
This Story is based on all the Anime, not the manga.
Yugi, Jaden, and Yusei remebers the Paradox Incident.


Here are rules for the main characters that must be followed in all the storylines.

Rules for Yugi only:

This is set in time after the Pharaoh passed on but you may or may not have The pharaoh return to Yugi in order to help him. You can do that (suggestions only) either by the Millenium Puzzle suddenly appear around Yugi's neck or by having the Pharaoh appear in a physical form.
If Atem (the pharaoh) is helping Yugi by some form of possession then he may have the Egyptian God Cards. but other then that no one else my have the Egyptian God Cards except the mastermind. The Legandary Dragons are also not usable.

Rules for Jaden only:

Yubel may be used by Jaden only.


Rules for Yusei only:

Yusei can have his Sinner mark.
He may use Stardust Dragon and Shooting Star Dragon but no Shooting Quesar Dragon, unless the mastermind is made to betray them and it is needed
.

Rules for Yuma only:

Yuma and other Number Hunters are the only ones to use Number Cards.
Number 39: Utopia and Chaos Number 39: Utopia Ray are the only Number Cards he uses.
Astral can be seen by who: Have or had a millenium item/shadow item, Can see duel spirits, Has or has a sinner/dark sinner mark, Have a strong bond and faith in there deck and abilities, or is a spirit.
Astral can see Duel Spirits but at first Yuma can not.

Idea for final chapter:

A epic duel between the mastermind vs. one of or all of the main characters of each series.
To help you with there decks then look to: http://yugioh.wikia.com/wiki/Main_Page

Have fun.
